title: Turret's and Diving
body:
Wouldn't It be better If turrets were dealing more damage to the enemy If they are getting hit because they attacked you? Like Turret's are protecting nothing... If I fall enemy laner easily dives me and kills me then gets out...
"just stay under turret"
stays under turret*
enemy Garen comes goes under turret Q E R kills you gets out with more hp than he dived... :D

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Akaśhí,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XITBiLPt,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-23T09:02:30.521+0000)
>
> Turret's and Diving

Turret's what? Turret's durability? Turret's offensive power? And which turret are you referring to?
Turrets are already dealing significantly more damage. It is extremely noticeable.
They buffed turrets... You can tell
